metadata.title: CVE-2018-15472 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition before11.1.7, 11.2.x before 11.2.4, and 11.3.x before 11.3.1. The diff formatterusing rouge can block for a long time in Sidekiq jobs without any timeout.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
